nodes.text: Klin Anwa was a male Silika and the brother of Kenta Anwa, who had been defeated by Dannen Lifehold in a Silika water drinking contest. Klin and a group of Silika friends saved Lifehold's life when he was assaulted by Linkaas' thugs Chokk and Bakk. Klin asked for nothing in return, other than being allowed to take a picture with his holocamera of the great Silika water champion, Dannen Lifehold.
